wnutils package¶

A package of python routines to read and plot webnucleo xml and hdf5 files.

Subpackages¶

  • wnutils.read package
    • Submodules
    • wnutils.read.h5 module

wnutils.utils module¶

wnutils.utils.get_latex_names(nuclides)[source]¶

Function to get latex string of a nuclide’s name.

Args:
nuclides (list): A list of strings giving the nuclides.
Returns:
A dictionary of latex strings.
